TopicTitle: Presets for a MadCatz Flightstick V1?

Articles.Content:
So I got the Cyborg/MadCats V1 Flight stick quite a while ago and yesterday I decided to see how it did on ksp. I've spent all evening trying to make a preset and just can't seem to get it right. Anyone got a working preset?

PS: Don't know which thread this should be in :/
